Html:
Hi,

I am using a DateTimeAxis as my x-axis and would love to add the rolling window feature. However when I add the code below my graph only shows the date 1/1/0001 12:00:00 AM.
<d3:ChartPlotter.FitToViewRestrictions>
      <d3:FollowWidthRestriction Width="30"/>
</d3:ChartPlotter.FitToViewRestrictions>
I'm guessing the issue has to do with the width and setting that to match a Datetime instead of a double.

Wondering if anyone has any ideas for making this work or if it can be done at all?
